item.title: About me
item.description: What do I do? I like making and repairing things. I mostly make software, bread, and bad jokes. During the day, I work on enterprise software. This website is supposed to display what I do on my free time. It is a bit empty right now.

item.title: My Projects
item.description: A List of My Projects vue-dispatched-scrollbar My first open source project. A library for Vue.js, it allow you to detach the scrollbar from the element you want scrolling to occur. Github (demo ) npm xdg-urlview A fork of urlview which respects the Freedesktop XDG Base Directory Specification and does not want you to litter your home directory with config files. Github
